backend/main.mo: Defines types and in-memory state for auth, profiles, subscriptions, quotas, posts, listings, surprises, and interactions, plus functions for user auth creation and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing component purposes, behaviors, and styling patterns.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration defining caching, content types, and security headers for frontend deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with design tokens for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, analytics script, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application orchestrating sections, global state, context, authentication, demo mode, and feature modules.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Modal authentication dialog with sign‑in/sign‑up tabs, Google login, error handling, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Reusable Google‑styled button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides sign‑in and sign‑out UI using Internet Identity with Google branding and manages the auth dialog state.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows development‑only warnings for actor initialization or missing canister IDs with a dismissible alert banner.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Displays a badge indicating the user's plan tier (free, pro, or creator) with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Applies a fade‑in animation when content enters the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: React Query hooks fetching authenticated user data including download history, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Mutation hook that creates or updates a user auth record after Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Exports birthday card images by rendering templates or premium designs to canvas with text, backgrounds, and download support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads an image with cross‑origin support for use in canvas rendering.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF of a BirthdayPack using a popup window and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Wraps text into lines based on canvas width, returning up to 12 lines for card rendering.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a summary card for a community post with follow and view actions, using user identity and follow state.
Shows a dialog with full community post details and follow controls, including metadata and creator info.
Provides a form dialog to create a new community post, handling input, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks to fetch all community posts or a single post from the backend actor.
Mutation hook for creating community posts, invalidating caches and showing toast notifications on result.
Manages following creators using localStorage, provides hooks to follow and check follow status with backend sync.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines a set of sample birthday wishes with names, relationships, tones, and messages.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Exports predefined lists of relationships, tones, languages, and personalities used for wish generation.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a readable multi-section text block for display or export.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates a birthday content pack using form inputs and language-specific phrase sets. Includes functions for main wish, short message, caption, mini speech, and hashtags.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides English, Hinglish, and Hindi phrase dictionaries and returns the correct set based on selected language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized GeneratorFormData values using predefined lists and a helper to pick random items.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines types for relationships, tones, languages, personalities, form data, birthday pack, and template IDs.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: UI dialog for creating a marketplace listing with validation, entitlement checks, and mutation submission.
Displays a marketplace listing card with metadata, price, creator info, and a request-to-buy action.
Dialog allowing buyers to contact sellers, copy or send a prefilled message, and record interest.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation hook for creating new marketplace listings and handling success/error states.
Mutation hook that records a buyer’s interest in a listing and triggers UI feedback.
Query hook for fetching the interaction count of a listing when authenticated.
Provides React Query hooks to fetch all marketplace listings or a specific listing using an actor API.
Defines a hook to initiate plan upgrades, validating config and showing placeholder Razorpay integration messages.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Renders a grid of 'coming soon' premium card features with icons and descriptions.
UI panel for adjusting card design options including background, typography, colors, alignment, and photo uploads.
Provides buttons and handlers for exporting, sharing, or copying premium card outputs in multiple formats.
Main module managing theme selection and design steps, integrating preview, customization, exports, and navigation.
Generates a live visual preview of the premium card using theme settings, animations, emojis, and optional photo.
Defines all premium card themes and a helper to fetch a theme by ID.
Defines types and interfaces for premium card themes and designer state, including theme styles and user selections.
React hook managing premium card designer state with setters for theme, styles, colors, and photo options.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Handles local quota tracking using localStorage, providing functions to get, increment, and calculate remaining quota.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: Combines local and backend quota logic to expose remaining messages, limits, and a mutation to record usage.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata, entitlements, and utilities to fetch plan details for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: UI component that locks features and shows a button to open the pricing modal when access is restricted.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Modal displaying plan comparisons and enabling upgrades via Razorpay, highlighting selected plans.
Renders a feature comparison table for free, pro, and creator plans using simple icons and text.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: Hook determining a user’s effective plan and entitlements based on authentication and backend subscription status.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: Hook fetching the authenticated user's subscription status from the backend using react-query.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: Displays a surprise message with confetti, reveal animations, and optional background music after loading payload data.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: Hooks for creating surprise links and fetching their payloads using react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns combined base and template-specific CSS classes for a given template ID.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Defines a registry of background image paths and a helper to retrieve them by key.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Exports template metadata including styling, images, and preview settings for each template.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to report whether a referenced element is in view.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages and persists a user's selected plan in localStorage scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects if the user prefers reduced motion via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries backend to verify authenticated principal and returns it or null.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, layout rules, component styles, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility to copy text to clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Provides helpers for formatting timestamps into relative or formatted dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens principal strings for display by truncating with ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community section with tabs, post lists, authentication-aware filtering, and dialogs for viewing and creating posts.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Displays user dashboard data such as subscription status, quotas, downloads, saved templates, and earnings, with fallback messaging for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Shows sample wishes with a tone filter and displays each wish in a card grid.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders a list of FAQs inside an accordion with animated reveal sections.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Provides footer content including brand info, navigation links, legal links, and attribution.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the birthday wish generator form, handles validation, quota checks, generation logic, and output management.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing hero with branding, auth prompts, demo buttons, and animated visuals.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Displays privacy policy, terms, and refund policy content inside styled cards with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Shows marketplace listings with search, filtering, listing creation dialog, and MVP purchase notes.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Presents generated birthday outputs with copy, share, download, and premium actions.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Lists subscription plans with features, pricing, and upgrade actions using animated cards.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Lets users choose a birthday card template and previews the selected design with generated content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean them from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config for a React app with env var injection, alias setup, build options, and a local API proxy.
project_state.json: Captures project state, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and feature definitions for WishMint AI.
